title: CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program
chunks:
CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Features and Benefits > What’s Included? > - **Flat 15% Discount** on base airfare for all eligible serving and retired armed forces personnel.
- Applicable for **CloudSaver (Economy)**, **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**, and **CloudElite (Business Class)** fares on all domestic and international CloudWay 24-operated flights.
- **Complimentary Additional 10kg Baggage Allowance** on all tickets booked under this scheme.
- **Priority Check-in** and **Boarding Privileges** at all major hubs.

CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Eligibility > Who is Eligible? > - **Serving Personnel** of the Indian Army, Navy, Air Force, Coast Guard, and Paramilitary Forces.
- **Retired/ Ex-Servicemen** of the above services.
- **Immediate Family Members**(spouse and dependent children) when traveling with the eligible personnel.

CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Steps to Avail the Discount > 1. **Sign Up / Login** with your email or mobile on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay24 App (iOS/Android).
2. **Select “Plan My Flight”** and enter your round trip or one-way details.
3. **On the passenger details page**, choose “Armed Forces Discount” and upload valid service/retirement ID proof.
4. **Proceed to payment** — discounted fare and baggage benefits will be automatically applied.
5. **Complete booking** using credit/debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.

CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Documentation Requirements > Acceptable ID Proofs > - Government-issued Armed Forces Service Card (for serving personnel)
- Pension Payment Order/ Ex-Serviceman Identity Card/ Retirement Card (for retired personnel)
- Dependent ID Card (for family members)

CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Terms & Conditions > - The armed forces discount is subject to seat availability under the applicable fare class.
- Discount is applicable **only on base fare**, not including taxes, surcharges or add-ons.
- Not combinable with other promotional offers.
- Valid ID proof must be carried and shown at check-in/counters.
- CloudWay 24 reserves the right to withdraw or modify the offer at any time.

CloudWay 24 | Armed Forces Discount Program > Brand Message > **Seamless Skies, Global Reach.**
_Discover the world with respect—and savings._

🌐 [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com)

title: Cancel Your Booking with CloudWay 24
chunks:
Cancel Your Booking with CloudWay 24 > How to Cancel Your Booking > Steps to Cancel Your Booking via Website and Mobile App > You can cancel your booking in two convenient ways:

**Website**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com).
- Sign in with your email or mobile number.
- Navigate to **Manage My Flight**.
- Select **Cancel Your Booking**.
- Enter your booking details (Booking reference and Last name).
- Review your booking details and click **Proceed to Cancel**.
- Confirm your choice. If eligible, your refund amount and policy will be displayed.
- Submit the cancellation request.

**CloudWay 24 Mobile App (iOS/Android)**
- Open the CloudWay 24 app.
- Log in to your account.
- Go to **Manage My Flight**.
- Tap on **Cancel Your Booking**.
- Select your trip or enter your booking reference.
- Review your booking details and click **Proceed to Cancel**.
- Confirm your choice. If eligible, your refund amount and policy will be displayed.
- Submit the cancellation request.

Cancel Your Booking with CloudWay 24 > Refund & Cancellation Policy > - **Refund eligibility:** Depends on fare type, class of travel, and time of cancellation.
- **Flexible tickets:** Eligible for full or partial refund, as per fare conditions.
- **Promotional or non-refundable fares:** Generally non-refundable except for taxes, as per policy.
- **Refund method:** Processed to the original payment method (credit/debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points).
- **Processing time:** Refunds are typically processed within 7–10 business days.

**Note:**
- Cancellation fees may apply based on fare class and timing.
- No-shows or last-minute cancellations may receive reduced refunds.
- For third-party/travel agent bookings, please contact the respective agent for cancellation.

Cancel Your Booking with CloudWay 24 > Need Assistance? > - **CloudWay 24 Customer Care:** Available 24/7 via website chat, app support, or helpline.
- For more information, visit our [FAQs](https://cloudway24.com/faq).

> Fly Seamless. Fly CloudWay 24.

title: Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia
chunks:
Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > General Guidelines > - **Passport Validity:**  
  Most Asian countries require a passport with at least 6 months’ validity from the date of entry.
- **Blank Pages:**  
  At least 2 blank pages are usually recommended for entry/exit stamps and visas.
- **Return/Onward Ticket:**  
  Proof of onward or return travel is often required.
- **Travel Insurance:**  
  Strongly recommended; mandatory for some destinations.

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Singapore > - **Visa-Free:**  Indian citizens (up to 30 days for select categories, mostly require e-visa prior to travel)
- **E-Visa:**  Required for Indian passport holders (Apply before travel)
- **On Arrival:**  Not available
- **Documents:**  Proof of funds, return ticket, hotel booking

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Thailand > - **Visa-On-Arrival:** For Indian citizens (up to 15 days, fee payable, limited entry points)
- **E-Visa:** Option available
- **Requirements:**  Proof of accommodation, funds, return ticket

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Japan > - **Visa Required:** All Indian citizens must obtain a visa in advance from the Japanese embassy/consulate
- **Documents:**  Invitation letter/travel itinerary, bank statement, return ticket

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Malaysia > - **E-Visa:** Available for Indian tourists (Apply online prior to travel, valid for 30 days)
- **Visa-On-Arrival:** Possible when arriving from Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, or Brunei (conditions apply)
- **Requirements:** Proof of funds, return/onward ticket, hotel booking

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > United Arab Emirates (Dubai) > - **E-Visa:** Required for Indian passport holders (Apply online, typically via airline or sponsor)
- **Visa-on-arrival:** For Indian passport holders with US Green Card/UK/EU Residence Permit (14 days)
- **Documents:** Return ticket, hotel booking

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Indonesia (Bali/Jakarta) > - **Visa-on-arrival:** Indian citizens eligible (USD fee, valid for 30 days, extendable)
- **E-Visa:** Pre-application possible
- **Requirements:** Return flight, hotel booking

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Nepal > - **Visa-Free:** For Indian citizens (no visa required, must carry valid passport/election ID)
- **Entry Points:** Airports and designated land borders

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Bangladesh > - **Visa Required:** Indian citizens need a visa; advance application required
- **Documents:** Travel itinerary, invitation (as applicable), hotel booking

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > Hong Kong (SAR) > - **Pre-arrival Online Registration:** Mandatory for Indian citizens (up to 14 days stay)
- **Visa Required:** For stays longer than 14 days, work, or study

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Popular Asian Destinations: Visa Policy Overview > China > - **Visa Required:** Indian passport holders must obtain a visa prior to travel
- **Application:** At designated Visa Application Centres
- **Documents:** Detailed itinerary, hotel booking, financial proof

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Important Notes > - **Visa and entry requirements can change without notice.**  
  Always confirm the latest requirements from official government sources or the respective country's embassy/consulate before booking.
- **CloudWay 24 does not guarantee travel or immigration approval.**  
  Passengers are responsible for securing valid travel documents.

Visa and Passport Requirements for Destinations in Asia > Contact and Assistance > **For detailed assistance, visit our website [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or get in touch with our customer support.**

title: Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features
chunks: Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Aircraft Overview: Airbus A380 > The **Airbus A380** is the world’s largest passenger airliner, renowned for its double-deck, wide-body design, offering unmatched space, comfort, and quietness in long-haul travel. With its advanced aerodynamics and efficient engines, the A380 is a flagship for many leading airlines, optimizing both capacity and passenger experience.

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Seating Capacity > - **Total Seating:** *Typically 500–575 passengers* (can be configured for up to 853 in all-economy layout)
- **Decks:** Double-deck (Main and Upper)
- **Class Configuration (typical 4-class layout):**
    - First Class: 8–14 seats
    - Business Class: 70–100 seats
    - Premium Economy: 50–55 seats
    - Economy Class: 350–450 seats

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Cabin Features by Class > First Class (CloudLux) > - **Seating:** Fully flat suites with privacy doors (1-2-1 configuration)
- **Features:**
    - Personal suite with lie-flat bed
    - Direct aisle access
    - Luxury amenity kits & designer bedding
    - Personal wardrobe storage
    - Private minibar
    - In-seat power and USB charging
    - 32-40” HD inflight entertainment screens
    - Access to onboard lounge/bar (select airlines)
    - Fine-dining menus, served on demand

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Cabin Features by Class > Business Class (CloudElite) > - **Seating:** Lie-flat seats, staggered or herringbone layout (1-2-1 or 2-2-2)
- **Features:**
    - 180° lie-flat seats with direct aisle access
    - Plush bedding and privacy dividers
    - On-demand gourmet dining
    - 18-24” personal entertainment screens
    - Ample storage & power outlets
    - Enhanced amenity kits
    - Access to onboard lounge (on select aircraft)

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Cabin Features by Class > Premium Economy (CloudComfort) > - **Seating:** Wider seats, extra legroom (2-3-2 or 2-4-2)
- **Features:**
    - Up to 38” seat pitch, 19–20” width
    - Deeper seat recline and adjustable footrests
    - Enhanced meal service & welcome drinks
    - 13–15” personal screens
    - Dedicated cabin and lavatories
    - Extra luggage allowance

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Cabin Features by Class > Economy Class (CloudSaver) > - **Seating:** Standard seats (3-4-3 on main deck; 2-4-2 on upper deck, select rows)
- **Features:**
    - Seat pitch: 31–33”, width: 18–18.5”
    - Adjustable headrests
    - Personal 10–13” HD screens
    - Hundreds of movies, music, games
    - Complimentary meals and beverages
    - Family and bassinet seating options
    - Power outlets on select fleets

Airbus A380: Overview & Cabin Features > Additional A380 Features > - **Spacious cabins with reduced noise levels**
- **Mood lighting for reduced jetlag**
- **Wide aisles and larger lavatories**
- **Onboard bars/lounges for premium cabins (some airlines)**
- **Advanced air filtration and humidity control**
- **Wheelchair-accessible lavatories**

> **Note:** Seating configuration and amenities may vary by airline.

title: CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Cabin Baggage Allowance > CloudWay 24 offers generous and convenient baggage allowances tailored to each cabin class, ensuring a comfortable and seamless journey for all passengers.

| Class          | Number of Bags | Max Weight (per bag) | Maximum Dimensions (L x W x H) |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| **CloudLux (First)**         | 2                | 10 kg each            | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudElite (Business)**    | 2                | 8 kg each             | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | 1           | 8 kg                  | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**     | 1                | 7 kg                  | 55 x 40 x 23 cm                |

> *In addition: 1 small personal item (laptop bag/handbag) per passenger is permitted.*

CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Checked Baggage Allowance > | Class          | Number of Bags | Max Weight (per bag) | Total Allowance |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------- | --------------- |
| **CloudLux (First)**         | 3                | 32 kg                | 96 kg           |
| **CloudElite (Business)**    | 2                | 32 kg                | 64 kg           |
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | 2           | 23 kg                | 46 kg           |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**     | 1                | 23 kg                | 23 kg           |

> *Bags exceeding 158 cm (62 in) in total dimensions (L+W+H) or the permitted weight may incur excess baggage fees.*

CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Excess Baggage Policy > - **Excess Baggage**: Can be pre-purchased at a discounted rate via the CloudWay24 app or website during booking or under "Manage My Flight."
- **At Airport**: Higher fees apply for additional or overweight baggage checked at the airport counter.
- **SkyPoints 24 Members**: Elite tier members may enjoy additional free allowance—check your SkyPoints 24 tier benefits.

CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Special Baggage > - Sporting equipment and musical instruments accepted as part of checked baggage allowance; items exceeding size/weight limits may attract charges.
- Contact customer service for special arrangements or detailed advice.

CloudWay 24 Baggage Allowance Policy > Important Guidelines > - All baggage must be properly labeled with your name and contact information.
- Carry-on luggage must fit in the overhead bin or under the seat.
- Dangerous or prohibited items not allowed.

For the most up-to-date baggage rules and detailed FAQs, visit [CloudWay24.com/Baggage](https://CloudWay24.com/Baggage) or check the "Baggage Policy" section in the CloudWay24 app.

*Travel smooth. Travel CloudWay 24 – Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*

title: Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24
chunks:
Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > What To Do If Your Bag Is Delayed > Steps to reporting and tracking delayed baggage > 1. **Report Immediately**
   - Upon arrival, proceed to the CloudWay 24 Baggage Services Desk in the arrivals area **before exiting the airport**.
   - Provide your baggage claim tag and boarding pass.

2. **File a Report**
   - Fill out the *Property Irregularity Report (PIR)* with our baggage staff.
   - Note your local contact details and delivery address.

3. **Track Your Baggage**
   - Use the tracking reference number given on your PIR.
   - Visit [CloudWay24.com/baggage-tracking](https://CloudWay24.com/baggage-tracking) or track via the **CloudWay24 app**.

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > While You Wait > - **Essentials Kit:** Eligible passengers may receive an amenity kit with basic toiletries.
- **Expense Reimbursement:** Reimbursement may be provided (subject to policy and ticket class) for essential items purchased due to delayed baggage. Save all receipts.

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > Baggage Delivery > - Once your baggage arrives, CloudWay 24 will arrange free delivery to your local address listed in the PIR report.
- Our team will keep you updated via SMS, email, or calls.

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > Compensation & Claims > - If your bag is not located within 21 days, it may be treated as lost and compensation claims can be initiated as per our policy and international regulations (e.g., Montreal Convention).
- Submit claims on our website or through customer service.

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > Contacts & Support > - **CloudWay 24 Baggage Helpline:** [Customer Support Page](https://CloudWay24.com/contact)  
- **App:** Go to *Manage My Flight* > *Baggage Assistance*
- **Email:** baggage@cloudway24.com

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > Important Tips > - Always label your checked bags with your name and contact details.
- Keep your baggage tags and boarding passes until you collect your luggage.
- Pack essential medication and valuables in your carry-on.

Delayed Baggage – CloudWay 24 > Additional Information > For more details, visit: [CloudWay24.com/baggage](https://CloudWay24.com/baggage)

*Thank you for choosing CloudWay 24. We’re committed to resolving your baggage concerns as quickly as possible!*

title: Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24
chunks:
Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Introduction > Overview of Web Check-In > Web check-in with CloudWay 24 is an easy and convenient way to confirm your travel, choose your seat, and save valuable time at the airport. Here’s everything you need to know:

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Web Check-In Details > What is Web Check-In? > Web check-in allows you to check-in for your CloudWay 24 flight online via the website or mobile app before arriving at the airport. You can:

- Select/modify your seat
- Download/print your boarding pass
- Add frequent flyer details
- Save time and avoid airport queues

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Web Check-In Details > When Can I Check-In Online? > - **Opens:** 48 hours before scheduled departure
- **Closes:** 2 hours before the flight departure

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Steps to Complete Web Check-In > Step 1: Access Web Check-In
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://www.cloudway24.com) OR open the CloudWay24 mobile app  
- Go to: **Manage My Flight → Web Check-In**

Step 2: Enter Your Details
- Provide your:
  - Booking Reference (PNR)
  - Last Name or Registered Mobile/Email

Step 3: Select Passengers
- Choose the passenger(s) you wish to check-in from your booking.

Step 4: Choose Your Seat
- View seat map and:
  - Select or upgrade your seat (upgrade charges apply for premium cabins)
  - Confirm seat selection

Step 5: Add Extras (Optional)
- Indicate meal preferences
- Add or update frequent flyer details
- Request special assistance

Step 6: Confirm & Get Boarding Pass
- Confirm your check-in details
- Receive your boarding pass:
  - Download as PDF
  - Get a mobile e-boarding pass
  - Option to have it emailed

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Airport Procedures > Baggage Drop at the Airport > - **Already checked-in online?**  
  Drop off check-in bags at the **CloudWay 24 Baggage Drop Counter** at least 60 minutes before departure.

- **Traveling with only cabin baggage?**  
  Proceed directly to security with your e-boarding pass and valid ID.

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Important Information > Important Notes > - Web check-in may not be available for:
  - Passengers needing special assistance (medical, minors traveling alone, etc.)
  - Certain international flights due to security regulations
- Valid photo identification is mandatory at the airport, along with your boarding pass.
- If you have upgraded or changed your booking after check-in, re-issue your boarding pass.

---

Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Support > Need Help? > - Visit [CloudWay24.com/support](https://www.cloudway24.com/support)
- Contact the 24x7 CloudWay 24 Customer Care

---
Web Check-In Guide – CloudWay 24 > Closing Statement > Fly smart. Fly CloudWay 24 – *Seamless Skies, Global Reach.*

title: CloudWay 24: Employee Insurance Policy Overview
chunks:

- **Review & Update:**

title: Modify Trip Dates with CloudWay 24
chunks:
Modify Trip Dates with CloudWay 24 > Steps to Modify Your Trip Dates > Steps to Modify Your Trip Dates > ### 1. Log In

- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or open the **CloudWay 24** app.
- Log in using your email or mobile number and password.

### 2. Access "Manage My Flight"

- Navigate to the **"Manage My Flight"** section from the homepage or main menu.

### 3. Retrieve Your Booking

- Enter your booking reference number (PNR) and last name, or log in to view your bookings.
- Select the booking you wish to modify.

### 4. Select "Modify Your Booking"

- Click on the **"Modify Your Booking"** option.
- Choose **"Change Trip Dates"** from the available modification options.

### 5. Choose New Dates

- Select your new preferred departure (and return, if applicable) dates.
- Review available flights and seat options for your new travel dates.

### 6. Review Changes

- Compare the current and new flight details.
- Any fare differences or change fees, according to your ticket rules, will be displayed.

### 7. Confirm and Pay

- Agree to any additional charges if applicable (fare difference/change fee).
- Choose your payment option (credit card, debit card, netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points).
- Complete the payment.

### 8. Receive Confirmation

- You will receive a confirmation email and/or SMS with your updated travel itinerary.

Modify Trip Dates with CloudWay 24 > Notes & Policies > - **Change Fees:** Date changes may be subject to a change fee and/or fare difference depending on your fare type and class of travel.
- **Eligibility:** Some ticket types may have restrictions on date changes or may not be changeable.
- **Assistance:** For complex itineraries or group bookings, you may contact CloudWay 24 Customer Support.

Modify Trip Dates with CloudWay 24 > Need Help? > - Visit the **Help Center** on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com)
- Call Customer Support (contact info available on website)
- Reach us through the in-app chat for real-time assistance

title: Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24
chunks:
Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > General Policy > CloudWay 24 welcomes you and your furry companions aboard! To ensure a pleasant and safe journey for both you and your pet, please review our comprehensive guidelines for travelling with pets.

- **Eligible Pets:** Cats and small dogs (domesticated), in good health and at least 3 months old.
- **Allowed Routes:** Pets are permitted only on international flights operated exclusively by CloudWay 24.
- **Advance Booking:** Notify CloudWay 24 **at least 48 hours before departure** to reserve a spot for your pet.

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Pet Travel Options > | Option              | In-Cabin                 | Checked Baggage (Hold)         |
|---------------------|--------------------------|--------------------------------|
| Availability        | Select international routes (duration under 8 hours) | All direct international flights |
| Weight Limit        | **Up to 8 kg** (incl. carrier)   | Up to 32 kg (incl. carrier)    |
| Carrier Size (max)  | 43x33x20 cm              | 100x60x75 cm                   |
| Pet Fee             | USD 150 / INR 11,000     | USD 250 / INR 18,000           |

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Carrier Requirements > - **In-Cabin:** Soft-sided, leak-proof, well-ventilated carrier that fits under the seat.
- **Checked:** Rigid carrier with secure latch, absorbent bedding, and enough room for your pet to stand, turn, and lie down comfortably.
- Identification tag (with pet name and contact info).
- One carrier per passenger. Maximum 2 pets per booking (1 in-cabin, 1 in hold).

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Health & Documentation > - Valid **health certificate** from a licensed veterinarian issued within 10 days of departure.
- **Vaccination records** (including rabies certificate).
- **Import/export permits**, if required by destination country.

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Check-In & Boarding > - Arrive at least **2 hours before departure** for check-in.
- Use designated pet relief and holding areas (where available).
- In-cabin pets must remain in their carrier throughout the flight—no exceptions.

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Restrictions > - No pets allowed in **CloudLux (First Class)** or on select aircraft types due to space limitations.
- **Brachycephalic breeds** (flat-faced dogs/cats) may not be allowed in the hold for safety reasons.
- Not permitted as cargo or unaccompanied (except registered service animals—see special needs policy).

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > How to Book > Steps to Book Pet Travel > 1. **During flight booking:** Select "Travelling with Pets" and enter pet details.
2. **After booking:** Use "Manage My Flight" > "Add a Pet" option or contact Customer Care.
3. **Payment:** Pet travel fees must be paid online with Credit Card, Debit Card, Netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Tips for a Smooth Journey > - Feed your pet a light meal 2 hours before departure.
- Avoid tranquilizing your pet unless prescribed by a vet.
- Place a familiar toy or blanket in the carrier for comfort.
- Attach a current photo of your pet to the carrier.

Travelling with Pets on CloudWay 24 > Additional Information > For more information, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or contact our 24/7 Customer Support.

*CloudWay 24 – Seamless Skies for You and Your Pet!*

title: Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24
chunks: Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Overview > At CloudWay 24, we strive to ensure the safety and care of your baggage throughout your journey. However, in the rare event your baggage is damaged during transit, we are committed to addressing your concerns promptly and fairly.

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > What Qualifies as Damaged Baggage? > Damaged baggage includes:
- Broken handles, wheels, or locks
- Tears, holes, or serious dents in the baggage structure
- Damaged zippers or missing straps
- Soiling, stains, or water damage caused by airline handling

**Not Covered:**  
- Minor scratches, scuffs, or dents consistent with normal handling
- Pre-existing damage or overpacked bags
- Accessories or items attached to baggage (e.g., removable straps, covers)

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Reporting Damaged Baggage > At the Airport > 1. **Report immediately** to the CloudWay 24 Baggage Service Desk before leaving the arrival hall.
2. Fill out the **Damaged Baggage Claim Form** with our representative.
3. Provide your **boarding pass**, **bag tags**, and a valid photo ID.

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Reporting Damaged Baggage > After Leaving the Airport > - If you notice the damage after leaving, report it in writing within **7 days** of receiving your baggage.
- Email: `baggagesupport@cloudway24.com`  
- Include: Photos of the damage, baggage tag, travel details, and contact information.

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Our Compensation Policy > CloudWay 24 will:
- Evaluate the extent and cause of the damage.
- Offer a repair service, replacement bag, or financial compensation (as per international conventions and airline policy).
- Compensation may vary depending on the level of damage, bag age, and documentation provided.

**Note:**  
CloudWay 24’s liability for damaged baggage is limited as per the Montreal Convention and company policy.

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Exclusions > - Fragile, perishable, or valuable items packed in checked luggage
- Incorrectly packed or overstuffed baggage
- Minor cosmetic damages
- Delayed reporting (claims after 7 days of arrival)

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Contact & Support > - **Baggage Desk** at any CloudWay 24 arrival hall
- **Customer Support:**  
  - Email: `baggagesupport@cloudway24.com`  
  - Website: [CloudWay24.com/support](https://cloudway24.com/support)  
  - App: Use “Manage My Flight” > “Report Baggage Issue”

Damaged Baggage Policy – CloudWay 24 > Helpful Tips > - Keep your bag tags and receipts until the end of your journey.
- Inspect your baggage immediately upon collection.
- Use name labels on your baggage.

title: How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24
chunks:
How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Flight Bookings > - **Earn SkyPoints 24 every time you fly with CloudWay 24:**
    - Points are credited based on *distance flown*, *class of travel*, and *SkyPoints 24 tier*.
    - All cabin classes qualify:  
        - CloudLux (First Class) – Highest points accrual  
        - CloudElite (Business Class)  
        - CloudComfort (Premium Economy)  
        - CloudSaver (Economy)

- **How points are calculated:**
    - *Base Points* per mile/kilometer, with bonus for higher cabin class and tier status.
How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Booking Upgrades > - **Upgrade using cash or SkyPoints 24 and earn points on the original and upgraded booking value.**

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Partner Flights > - **Earn SkyPoints 24 on partner airline flights:**
    - Book with CloudWay 24’s code-share and alliance partners using your SkyPoints 24 membership number.
    - Points accrual depends on the fare class and partner agreement.

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Hotel & Car Rental Partners > - **Book with CloudWay 24 hotel or rental car partners through CloudWay24.com or app:**
    - Add your SkyPoints 24 number when booking to earn points for eligible stays/rentals.

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Shopping & Lifestyle Partners > - **Earn points by shopping with CloudWay 24 retail, dining, and lifestyle partners:**
    - See the latest partner list and eligible offers on CloudWay24.com or the app.

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ways to Earn SkyPoints 24 > Special Promotions > - **Participate in exclusive promotions:**
    - Bonus SkyPoints 24 on select routes, during festive periods, or for milestone journeys.
    - Check “Offers & Promotions” on the website/app or your registered email for details.

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > How to Maximize Points > - **Book directly:** Reserve flights via CloudWay24.com or the official app for full points.
- **Choose higher cabins:** Higher fares (CloudLux, CloudElite) yield more points.
- **Link your SkyPoints 24 number:** Always provide your membership number for every eligible booking and purchase.
- **Look out for double/mileage bonus promotions!**

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Track Your Points > - Access your account on CloudWay24.com or the CloudWay24 app  
- Check “My SkyPoints 24” dashboard for:
    - Earned, bonus, and pending points balance
    - Recent transactions and activity history

How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Important Notes > - **Points eligibility:** Only qualifying fares and eligible partners earn SkyPoints 24.
- **Retro-claim:** Missed points? Submit a retro-claim via the SkyPoints 24 section within 6 months of your travel/purchase.
- **Terms Apply**: Please refer to the detailed SkyPoints 24 program T&Cs at [CloudWay24.com](https://www.cloudway24.com).
How to Earn SkyPoints 24 with CloudWay 24 > Ready to start earning? > [Sign Up or Log In](https://www.cloudway24.com) to SkyPoints 24—and let your journeys be more rewarding!

title: CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy > Employee Free Tickets Policy > **All full-time CloudWay 24 employees are eligible for:**
- **4 (four) round-trip international tickets per calendar year**  
  - These can be used by the employee or together for family travel
  - Employees may use all 4 round-trip tickets at once for family trips  

**Ticket Details:**
- Eligible routes: Any CloudWay 24 operated international route
- Validity: Tickets must be used within the calendar year; unused tickets will not roll-over

CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy > Special Entitlement for Pilots & Senior Members > **Pilots and employees at Senior Management level and above are entitled to:**
- Complimentary upgrade to **CloudElite (Business Class)** on their 4 annual free round-trip tickets

**Additional Perks:**
- Priority check-in and boarding
- Lounge access for themselves and accompanying family using free tickets

CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy > Family Travel Usage > - Employees can opt to use all 4 round-trip tickets in one go for family travel (e.g., 1 trip with the employee + 3 family members)
- Family defined as: spouse, children, or dependent parents, as registered in HR records

CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy > Additional Travel Discounts > - Beyond the 4 free round trips, employees receive:
  - **50% discount** on unlimited additional tickets (Economy Class)
  - Upgrades to higher cabin classes at special staff rates (subject to availability)
  - SkyPoints 24 loyalty program points are earned on discounted tickets (unless otherwise specified)

CloudWay 24 Employee Free Tickets & Discounts Policy > Terms & Conditions > - All bookings must be made via the **CloudWay 24 Staff Portal**.
- Free tickets are subject to seat availability and blackout dates may apply (e.g., major holiday periods).
- Tickets are non-transferable except for immediate family as per HR records.
- Taxes and surcharges (if any) to be borne by the employee.
- Abuse of staff travel privileges may result in disciplinary action.

For more details or to book your staff travel tickets, log in to the [CloudWay 24 Staff Portal](https://cloudway24.com/staff).

**Fly further with your CloudWay 24 family!**

title: Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24
chunks:
Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Why Upgrade? > - **Enhanced Comfort:** Enjoy wider seats, additional legroom, and premium cabin amenities.
- **Exclusive Services:** Priority check-in, extra baggage allowance, gourmet meals, and lounge access (varies by cabin).
- **Personalized Experience:** Dedicated crew and a curated selection of entertainment and dining options.

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Cabin Classes Available for Upgrade > - **CloudSaver (Economy)** → **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)**
- **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** → **CloudElite (Business Class)**
- **CloudElite (Business Class)** → **CloudLux (First Class)**

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Steps to Upgrade Your Seat > 1. **Visit Us Online or Use Our App**
   - Go to [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or open the *CloudWay24* app.
   - Login to your account.

2. **Access "Manage My Flight"**
   - Select the booking you want to upgrade.
   - Click on "Upgrade Your Seat."

3. **Choose Your Preferred Cabin Class**
   - View available seats across higher classes.
   - Review upgrade costs in your preferred currency or pay with your SkyPoints 24 points.

4. **Make Payment**
   - Options: Credit card, Debit card, Netbanking, or SkyPoints 24 points.
   - Confirm your upgrade.

5. **Receive Confirmation**
   - An updated e-ticket will be sent to your email and app.

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Additional Ways to Upgrade > - **Airport Upgrade Desk:** Ask at the CloudWay 24 counter during check-in (subject to availability).
- **Upgrade Offers:** Look out for special upgrade emails or in-app notifications before your flight.

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > SkyPoints 24 Members > - Use your accumulated points for full or partial upgrades.
- Tier status may offer complimentary or discounted upgrades on select flights (check your benefits).

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Important Notes > - Upgrades are subject to seat availability.
- Upgrade fees and points required are non-refundable, unless the airline initiates the downgrade.
- Terms and conditions apply; refer to our website for details.

Upgrade Your Seat with CloudWay 24 > Need Help? > Contact our 24x7 customer support via:
- Chat on the CloudWay24 app
- Email: support@cloudway24.com
- Phone: (Toll-free numbers available on the website)

title: CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure
chunks: CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Overview > This procedure outlines how CloudWay 24 Pilots and Cabin Crew may claim reimbursement for approved expenses incurred during duty travel, excluding accommodation and transport (which are already provided by the airline).

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Eligible Expenses > - **Meals & Refreshments:** When not provided by CloudWay 24 during layovers.
- **Communication Costs:** Work-related calls/internet when airline-provided options are unavailable.
- **Uniform Maintenance:** Laundry or pressing services during extended layovers (minimum 2 nights).
- **Official Miscellaneous Purchases:** Items bought at the explicit request of a supervisor (e.g., minor crew supplies).
- **Other Approved Costs:** As pre-authorized by Flight Operations or Cabin Services Management.

> _Personal entertainment, alcohol (unless required for official functions), souvenirs, or gifts are **NOT reimbursable**._

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Expense Limits > - **Meal Allowance:** Per-diem rates as per company policy by city/destination (refer to Intranet or ask HR).
- **Communication:** Maximum INR 1,000 per trip, unless pre-approved for higher spend.
- **Uniform Maintenance:** Up to INR 500 per eligible layover.

_If in doubt, seek written approval from your Line Manager before incurring the expense._

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Claim Submission Process > Documentation Required > - **Original Receipts:** Must state amount, date, item/service, and location.
- **Expense Claim Form:** Downloadable from CloudWay 24 Staff Portal.
- **Supervisor Approval:** (If claiming under ‘Other Approved Costs’).
CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Claim Submission Process > Submission Timeline > - Submit claims **within 30 days** of completion of the trip/duty.

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Claim Submission Process > Steps to Submit a Claim > 1. Log in to CloudWay 24 Staff Portal.
2. Navigate to: **HR Services > Expense Claims**.
3. Fill in all required details, upload scanned receipts.
4. Add any required remarks/supervisory approvals.
5. Submit for Processing.

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Processing & Reimbursement > - Claims reviewed within **7 business days**.
- If approved, reimbursement via salary or direct bank credit in the next pay cycle.
- Incomplete or non-compliant claims will be returned for correction.

CloudWay 24 Staff Expense Claim Procedure > Contact > - For claim status, contact: **HR Helpdesk** (hr@cloudway24.com)
- For policy clarifications, contact: **Flight Ops Admin Team** or **Cabin Services Admin Team**

**Remember:** Falsification of expenses may result in disciplinary action, up to and including termination of employment.

title: CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights
chunks:
CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights > Passenger Rights Overview > At CloudWay 24, we are committed to providing a safe, comfortable, and reliable travel experience for all our passengers. We believe in transparency, prompt communication, and protecting the interests of our travelers. Below are your fundamental passenger rights when flying with CloudWay 24.

---

CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights > Right to Information > - **Clear Fare & Fee Disclosure:** You are entitled to complete information regarding fares, taxes, surcharges, and any additional fees at the time of booking.

---

CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights > Right to Care & Assistance > - **Delays and Cancellations:**

- **Denied Boarding:**

---

CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights > Right to Refunds and Compensation > - **Refunds:**  
  - In case of flight cancellation or significant schedule change by CloudWay 24, you are entitled to a full refund or rebooking at no additional cost.
- **Compensation:**  
  - You may be eligible for compensation for flight delays, cancellations, or baggage issues as per DGCA guidelines and international conventions.

---

  - Passengers with reduced mobility or special requirements can request assistance during booking or up to 48 hours before departure.
- **Unaccompanied Minors & Elderly:**

---

CloudWay 24 – Passenger Rights > Right to Baggage Protection > - **Lost or Damaged Baggage:**

title: CloudWay 24 Dangerous Goods Policy
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Dangerous Goods Policy > General Guidelines > As per international aviation safety regulations and CloudWay 24's commitment to passenger safety, certain items are classified as **Dangerous Goods** and are strictly regulated. Please review the following policy to ensure compliance and avoid inconvenience during travel.

- **Prohibited Items:** Items that present a risk to health, safety, property, or the environment are **strictly prohibited**.
- **Declaration:** All dangerous goods must be declared at the time of check-in.
- **Special Permission:** Some items may be allowed only with prior approval.

CloudWay 24 Dangerous Goods Policy > Dangerous Goods Allowance Table > | Item Category                   | Check-In Baggage         | Hand Baggage             | Remarks                                                         |
|----------------------------------|-------------------------|--------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Explosives/Fireworks**         | Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes fireworks, flares, party poppers, ammunition.           |
| **Compressed Gases (incl. LPG)** |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes butane, propane, oxygen cylinders (except for medical use with prior approval). |
| **Flammable Liquids**            |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes paints, thinners, petrol, solvents, lighter fluid.      |
| **Flammable Solids**             |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Safety matches (1 small box per person in person only, not in bag) |
| **Poisons/Toxics**               |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes pesticides, arsenic, cyanide.                          |
| **Radioactive Materials**        |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | For commercial shipment only, not allowed for passenger baggage.|
| **Corrosives**                   |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes batteries (industrial), mercury, acids, bleach.         |
| **Lithium Batteries (Spare)**    | * See Remarks         |  Up to 2, <=100Wh      | Only for personal electronic devices; spares in hand baggage only. Max 2 per passenger. |
| **Household Aerosols (Non-flammable, Non-toxic)** | * Limited qty           |  100ml max each; total 1L | Aerosols (toiletries) in hand baggage subject to liquid restrictions. |
| **Medicines/Personal Toiletries**|  Allowed in limited qty|  Limited qty (100ml each)| Must be for personal use and non-explosive/non-flammable.     |
| **Small Oxygen Cylinders (Medical Need)** |  With Approval             |  With Approval           | Must be medically necessary, documentation required.             |
| **Alcoholic Beverages**          |  ≤5L, <70% ABV        |  ≤100ml per bottle (in international transit as duty free) | Must be sealed, per applicable duty-free regulations.            |
| **Sharp Objects/Tools**          |  With Restrictions    |  Not Allowed           | Knives, box cutters, scissors with blades >6cm in check-in only.|
| **E-cigarettes/Vaping Devices**  |  Not Allowed in check-in |  In hand baggage only   | Not for use onboard; spare batteries in hand baggage only.       |
| **Power Banks**                  |  Not Allowed          |  Max 2, <=100Wh each   | Not to be checked in under any circumstances.                    |
| **Self-heating Meals/Devices**   |  Not Allowed          |  Not Allowed           | Includes flameless ration heaters.                               |

---

### Key:
-  Allowed (with or without restrictions as noted)
-  Not Allowed
- * See Remarks: Additional conditions apply

CloudWay 24 Dangerous Goods Policy > Important Notes > - **Liquids, Gels, Aerosols:** In hand baggage, each container must be 100ml or less; total may not exceed 1 litre per passenger (packed in a clear, resealable bag).
- **Electronics:** Lithium battery-operated equipment may be carried in both check-in and hand baggage, but spares must only be in hand baggage and protected from short-circuiting.
- **Sharp Items:** Prohibited in hand baggage. Limited sizes and types may go in checked baggage if securely packed.

---

### For full list and updates, please refer to [CloudWay24.com/dangerous-goods](https://CloudWay24.com/dangerous-goods) or contact our customer service before your journey.

*Failure to comply may result in removal of prohibited items, denial of boarding, or legal action as per applicable law.*

---

title: Boarding Process with CloudWay 24
chunks:
Boarding Process with CloudWay 24 > Boarding Process Overview > CloudWay 24 is committed to delivering a smooth and efficient boarding experience for all passengers. Below is an outline of the standard boarding process, from check-in to takeoff.

---

Boarding Process with CloudWay 24 > Boarding Steps > Steps to Complete the Boarding Process > 1. **Check-In**

   - **Online Check-In:**  
     Available 48 to 2 hours prior to departure via [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or the CloudWay 24 app (iOS & Android).
   - **Airport Check-In Counters:**  
     Open 3 hours before international departures and close 60 minutes prior to departure.
   - **Required Documents:**  
     Passport, visa (if required), and valid ticket/boarding pass.

2. **Baggage Drop**

   - Proceed to the designated baggage drop counter for your class:  
     - CloudLux / CloudElite: Dedicated Priority Counters  
     - CloudComfort / CloudSaver: Standard Counters
   - Ensure all bags abide by CloudWay 24's baggage policy (refer to ticket for details).

3. **Security & Immigration**

   - After check-in, proceed to security and immigration with boarding pass and travel documents.
   - Allow additional time for security checks during peak hours.

4. **Proceed to Gate**

   - Check your boarding gate on your boarding pass, the airport displays, or the CloudWay 24 app.
   - Boarding gates typically open 60 minutes and close 20 minutes before departure.
   - Priority boarding is announced and available for:
     - CloudLux (First Class)  
     - CloudElite (Business Class)  
     - SkyPoints 24 Elite/Frequent Flyers  
     - Passengers requiring special assistance and families with infants

5. **Boarding Sequence**

   1. **Pre-Boarding:**  
      Passengers who need special assistance, unaccompanied minors, and families with small children.
   2. **Priority Boarding:**  
      CloudLux, CloudElite, and eligible SkyPoints 24 members.
   3. **Zone Boarding:**  
      Remaining passengers board by zone, as indicated on the boarding pass or by gate staff.
   4. **Final Call:**  
      Last chance to board; listen for announcements.

6. **During Boarding**

   - Present your boarding pass and identification at the gate.
   - Gate staff will scan and verify your documents.
   - Follow signs and crew guidance to your designated seat.
   - Cabin crew will assist with stowing carry-on luggage and provide information as needed.

7. **Departure**

   - Please be seated and fasten your seatbelt prior to door closure.
   - Cabin crew will conduct safety demonstrations and perform final checks.
   - Relax and prepare for takeoff — your CloudWay 24 journey is about to begin!

---

Boarding Process with CloudWay 24 > Tips for Smooth Boarding > - Download and use the **CloudWay 24 App** for real-time updates, mobile boarding passes, and gate changes.
- Arrive at the airport well in advance, especially for international travel.
- Have all travel documents ready for inspection at each stage.

---

**For additional queries or assistance, visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com) or contact our customer support.**

_Safe travels with CloudWay 24: Seamless Skies, Global Reach._

title: CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew
chunks: CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Overview > CloudWay 24 prioritizes the comfort and well-being of its onboard crew, recognizing that adequate rest is critical for safety and excellent passenger service. CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Eligibility > - **Pilots:** All flight deck crew members (Captain, First Officer, Relief Pilots) on layover/duty away from home base.
- **Cabin Crew:** All operating crew (CloudLux, CloudElite, CloudComfort, CloudSaver service crew).

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Standard of Hotels > - 4-star and 5-star hotels, centrally located or near airports.
- Chain hotels preferred for consistency and safety.

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Room Allocation > - Single occupancy standard for all crew members.
- Secure & private accommodation.
- Twin sharing only by voluntary consent (for short layovers).

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Transfers > - Complimentary ground transportation between airport and hotel.
- Pre-arranged by CloudWay 24 or authorized handling agent.

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Facilities Provided > - 24-hour check-in/check-out flexibility for flight disruptions.
- In-room Wi-Fi and meal allowances/buffet breakfast included.
- Crew lounge access where available.
- Health & safety: Chosen hotels have robust security and clean food options.

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Special Provisions > - Early check-in/late check-out managed for irregular operations.
- Medical support/assistance from hotel or quick connections to local healthcare.
- Emergency contact and escalation with CloudWay 24 Operations Control.

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Booking Procedure > - Rostered crew bookings made in advance by Crew Scheduling Department.
- Hotel details relayed in daily roster and via CloudWay 24 Crew App.

CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > Feedback & Quality Control > - Crew can submit hotel feedback via Crew App/website.
- Regular review and audit of hotel partners to ensure compliance and crew satisfaction.
CloudWay 24 – Staff Accommodation Policy: Pilots & Cabin Crew > Accommodation Policy > **For further queries on staff accommodation, access the Crew Portal or contact Crew Scheduling.**

title: CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview)
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > Introduction and Overview > At CloudWay 24, our commitment to culinary excellence shines through in every class. Our menus are expertly curated, inspired by global cuisines and regional favorites, and updated seasonally to offer diversity and freshness. Here’s a class-wise overview of the fine-dining experience guests can expect on board:

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > CloudLux (First Class) > Overview and Highlights > **Overview:**  
CloudLux guests enjoy a fully customizable, haute-cuisine experience that blends international delicacies with Indian sophistication. Seasonal tasting menus are available, with options tailored to personal preferences.

**Highlights:**
- **Multi-course gourmet dining**: Starters, main courses, cheese boards, and artisanal desserts
- **Curated international wine and champagne list**
- **Fresh, premium ingredients**: Caviar, Wagyu, fresh seafood, truffles, and global specialty produce
- **Personalized service**: Order à la carte, or request chef’s special creations on select routes
- **Wide range of world cuisines**: French, Italian, Indian Royal, Pan-Asian, Middle Eastern, and more
- **Exclusive beverage pairings**: High-end spirits, aged whiskies, and luxury teas

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > CloudElite (Business Class) > Overview and Highlights > **Overview:**  
Business travelers in CloudElite enjoy restaurant-style dining with extensive menu options, reflecting both international classics and local dishes.

**Highlights:**
- **Multiple appetizers, mains, and dessert options on every flight**
- **Refined international cuisine**: Grilled meats & fish, traditional Indian curries, Asian specialties, and Mediterranean-inspired dishes
- **Vegetarian and health-focused selections always available**
- **Premium bread basket, cheese plates, and fruit selections**
- **Choice of wine, beer, select spirits, freshly brewed coffee, and teas**

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > CloudComfort (Premium Economy) > Overview and Highlights > **Overview:**  
CloudComfort offers enhanced meal choices and upgraded presentations compared to standard economy, bridging comfort and quality.

**Highlights:**
- **Multi-course meals with a choice of Western, Asian, and Indian dishes**
- **Salads, fresh bread rolls, and more substantial entrees**
- **Rotating desserts and fruit plates**
- **A variety of soft drinks, juices, and complimentary hot beverages**

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > CloudSaver (Economy Class) > Overview and Highlights > **Overview:**  
CloudSaver menus focus on satisfying, flavorful meals inspired by international tastes and comfort food classics.

**Highlights:**
- **Tasty, balanced meals with a selection of meat, vegetarian, and regional options**
- **Seasonal accompaniments such as salads or yogurts**
- **Choice of two or more main courses per flight**
- **Light dessert and fresh fruit**
- **Wide selection of non-alcoholic drinks, tea, and coffee**

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > Special Meal Requests > For all classes, a wide range of special meal requests (Vegan, Jain, Gluten-Free, Kosher, Child-friendly, Diabetic-friendly, and more) is available to pre-order when booking or through "Manage My Flight."

---

CloudWay 24 Fine-Dining Menus (Class-wise Overview) > Menu Refresh and Preview Information > *Menus are refreshed quarterly and may feature regional specialties based on flight route and destination. For a preview of onboard offerings for your route, please visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or the CloudWay 24 app.*

file_name: Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy.md
title: CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy
chunks: CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Introduction > At CloudWay 24, the safety, punctuality, and well-being of our staff are top priorities. This cab policy outlines the official guidelines for ground transportation arrangements for our **Pilots** and **Cabin Crew** members to and from designated airports and accommodations.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Eligibility > - **Pilots**: All full-time and contract cockpit crew operating CloudWay 24 flights.
- **Cabin Crew**: All active CloudLux, CloudElite, CloudComfort, and CloudSaver in-flight crew members rostered on duty.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Cab Coverage > - **Home Pick-Up/Drop-Off**:  
  Crew residing within a **25 km radius** of the hub airport (Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru) are eligible for home pick-up and drop-off.
- **Hotel/Airport Transfers**:  
  For layover flights or overnight stops, hotel-to-airport and airport-to-hotel cab arrangements are provided.
- **Scheduled Flights Only**:  
  This policy applies only when crew are reporting for or concluding a scheduled CloudWay 24 flight duty.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Cab Booking Process > 1. **Automatic Scheduling**:  
   Cabs are automatically scheduled based on the published crew roster.
2. **Self-Booking (Special Cases)**:  
   If auto-scheduling fails, crew may book a cab using the approved CloudWay 24 Staff App or by contacting Crew Logistics at least 6 hours prior to pick-up.
3. **Confirmation**:  
   Crew members will receive SMS/app notifications with cab details two hours before pick-up.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Cab Types > - **Premium sedans** for pilots.
- **Comfort sedans or MPVs** for cabin crew (sharing with a maximum of 3 crew per cab as per roster compatibility).
- All cabs are **company-contracted with verified drivers**.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Safety & Conduct > - 24/7 availability of cabs for both day and night shifts.
- GPS tracking enabled in all cabs.
- Only authorized personnel allowed in staff cabs.
- Crew must wear airline ID while in transit.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Payment & Reimbursement > - All authorized cab rides are **fully paid by the company**. No cash exchange required.
- Unauthorized personal deviations or additional stops are not covered and will require out-of-pocket payment.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Emergency Helpline > - Dedicated Crew Cab Helpline: **+91-XXXX-24CAB**
- App-based "SOS" button for immediate assistance.
CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Non-Compliance > - Misuse or unauthorized use may lead to disciplinary action as per CloudWay 24 HR policy.
CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Policy Review > - This policy is reviewed annually and subject to revision based on operational requirements.

CloudWay 24 – Staff (Pilots and Cabin Crew) Cab Policy > Contact Information > **For any clarifications, contact Crew Logistics or refer to the Staff Portal at [CloudWay24.com/crew](https://cloudway24.com/crew).**

title: CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster!
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster! > Introducing CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards > Unlock the best way to travel and reward yourself with SkyPoints! Our exclusive co-brand credit cards, in partnership with leading banks, allow you to accelerate your SkyPoints earnings every time you spend.

---

CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster! > SkyPoints Earning Structure > - **10X SkyPoints**  
  Earn 10 times the SkyPoints when you book CloudWay 24 flights using your co-brand credit card on [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or our official app.

- **4% SkyPoints**  
  Earn 4% back in SkyPoints on spending for other airlines and hotel bookings, worldwide.

- **2% SkyPoints**  
  Earn 2% back in SkyPoints on all other spends—retail, dining, shopping, utilities, and more.

---

CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster! > Card Benefits at a Glance > - **Accelerated SkyPoints Earning**  
  Supercharge your journey to free flights, upgrades, and exclusive rewards.
- **Seamless Integration**  
  Automatically earn SkyPoints—no additional steps required.
- **Redemption Flexibility**  
  Use SkyPoints for flights, upgrades, partner rewards, and more through the SkyPoints 24 program.
- **Travel Perks**  
  Get priority check-in, complimentary lounge access, and more (benefits may vary by card variant).

---

CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Cards: Earn SkyPoints Faster! > How to Apply? > Steps to Apply for CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Card > 1. Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://CloudWay24.com) or your preferred bank website.
2. Choose the "CloudWay 24 Co-brand Credit Card."
3. Fill in the application form and provide necessary documents.
4. Start earning SkyPoints as soon as your card is activated!

---

> **Tip:** Always use your CloudWay 24 co-brand card for booking flights directly with CloudWay 24 to maximize SkyPoints!

**Terms & Conditions apply. Point rates and benefits are subject to change as per the issuing bank’s and CloudWay 24’s policy.**

title: Flying with Children on CloudWay 24
chunks:
Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Pre-flight Preparation > - **Booking for Children**
  - Children under 2 years: Can travel as infants on lap or with a booked seat (additional charges may apply).
  - Children aged 2–12 years: Require their own seat and are eligible for child fares.
  - Unaccompanied Minors: Special handling and escort services available for children aged 5–12 flying alone. Request while booking.

- **Special Requests**
  - **Bassinet**: Request for infants (subject to availability and aircraft type).
  - **Child Meals**: Pre-book child-friendly meals at least 24 hours before departure via “Manage My Flight.”
  - **Seating Preferences**: Request seats together for families to ensure peace of mind.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > At the Airport > - **Priority Check-In**
  - Dedicated family counters at Mumbai, Delhi, and Bengaluru hubs.
- **Family Boarding**
  - Priority and early boarding for families with children.
- **Stroller Assistance**
  - Use your stroller at the airport up to the boarding gate. It will be delivered at the aircraft door upon arrival (where feasible).
- **Security Assistance**
  - Friendly staff available to help expedite and simplify the security process for families.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Onboard Comfort > - **In-Flight Entertainment**
  - Kids’ movies, cartoons, and interactive games in all cabins.
  - Kid-safe headphones on request.
- **Amenities**
  - Infant seat belts and baby cots (in specific rows).
  - Activity kits and soft toys for young flyers (CloudSaver and above).
- **Facilities**
  - Changing tables in restrooms.
  - Warming facilities for milk and baby food.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Child-Friendly Meals > - **Pre-Order**:
  - Reserve child meals (vegetarian and non-vegetarian) when booking or via “Manage My Flight.”
- **Special Dietary Needs**:
  - Contact our customer care for allergies or specific requirements.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Family Travel Tips > - Arrive early for a stress-free check-in.
- Carry necessary documents for infants (birth certificate or passport).
- Pack essential items (diapers, wipes, snacks, favorite toys) in your cabin bag.
- Notify staff of any special needs.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Extra Services & Support > - **SkyPoints 24 Family Pooling**:
  - Earn and pool miles across your family for faster rewards.
- **Lounge Access**:
  - Complimentary lounge access in CloudLux and CloudElite classes, with play areas at select hubs.

Flying with Children on CloudWay 24 > Need More Help? > Visit our [website](https://CloudWay24.com) or mobile app (CloudWay24) for more details, or contact our 24x7 support team for personalized assistance on your family travel plans.

**CloudWay 24**  
*"Seamless Skies, Global Reach—for the whole family."*

file_name: Check Your Visa and Passport Requirements.md
title: CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide
chunks: CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Check Your Visa and Passport Requirements > Before booking your CloudWay 24 flight, ensure that you meet all entry requirements for your destination. Below is a quick-reference guide for visa and passport requirements for travelers from India to countries in **Europe**, **Western**, and **Middle East** regions.

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > General Requirements > - **Passport Validity:** Minimum 6 months validity from your date of arrival in most international destinations.
- **Blank Pages:** At least 2 blank pages recommended for visa/stamping.
- **Return Ticket:** Proof of onward/return travel may be required.
- **Travel Insurance:** Mandatory for Schengen (Europe) and recommended for others.

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Europe (Schengen Zone & Others) > | Country           | Passport Validity          | Visa Required (Indian Citizens) | Notes                                      |
|-------------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| **Schengen Zone** | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              | Covers most of Western/Central Europe      |
| France            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Germany           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Netherlands       | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Spain             | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Italy             | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Switzerland       | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Greece            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Austria           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Belgium           | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Sweden            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| Norway            | 6 months                  | Yes, Schengen Visa              |                                            |
| **UK**            | 6 months                  | Yes, UK Visa                    | Separate from Schengen                     |
| **Ireland**       | 6 months                  | Yes, Ireland Visa               | Separate from Schengen                     |
| **Russia**        | 6 months                  | Yes, Russian Visa               | Invitation letter needed for some purposes |
| **Turkey**        | 6 months                  | Yes, e-Visa/Sticker Visa        | e-Visa for tourism/business                |
| **Ukraine**       | 6 months                  | Yes, e-Visa/Sticker Visa        |                                            |

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Western Europe (Highlights) > > Most Western Europe countries are under the Schengen Zone.  
> United Kingdom and Ireland have separate visa policies.

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Middle East Countries > | Country        | Passport Validity     | Visa Required (Indian Citizens)      | Notes                                               |
|----------------|----------------------|--------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| UAE (Dubai)    | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | Pre-arranged visa, On-arrival for some categories   |
| Saudi Arabia   | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | eVisa for tourism, other purposes need prior visa   |
| Qatar          | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/Sticker Visa              | On-arrival for Indians with valid US/UK/Schengen    |
| Oman           | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa                          | On-arrival possible for select travelers            |
| Kuwait         | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa                          |                                                     |
| Bahrain        | 6 months             | Yes, eVisa/On-Arrival               |                                                     |
| Israel         | 6 months             | Yes, Sticker Visa                    | Apply in advance                                    |
| Jordan         | 6 months             | Yes, Visa on Arrival (Indian tourists)|                                                     |
| Iran           | 6 months             | Yes, Visa on Arrival (at some airports) | Recommend pre-arranged Visa                         |

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > How to Check Your Requirements > 1. Visit **CloudWay24.com** or use the CloudWay24 App.
2. Go to "Plan My Flight" – select your **route** and **dates**.
3. Click on "Visa & Passport Info" on the booking page.
4. Review requirements for your nationality, transit rules, and special advisories.

CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Disclaimer > - Visa and entry rules change frequently.  
- Always verify the latest requirements on the [destination embassy/consulate website](https://www.timaticweb.com/) or with your travel agent before departure.
CloudWay 24: Visa and Passport Requirements Guide > Safe travels with CloudWay 24! > **Safe travels with CloudWay 24!**

title: CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy
chunks:
CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Eligible Special Baggage Categories > - **Sports Equipment**
  - Golf bags, skis, snowboards, bicycles, surfboards, cricket kits, etc.
- **Musical Instruments**
  - Guitars, violins, cellos, musical keyboards, etc.
- **Hunting & Sport Rifles**
  - Permitted only with valid licenses and prior airline approval.
- **Ammunition**
  - Only as checked baggage, under strict regulatory compliance.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Class-wise Special Baggage Allowance > | Cabin Class     | Free Special Baggage Allowance  | Additional Fees                | Priority Handling |
|-----------------|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------|
| **CloudLux (First Class)**    | 2 special items included            | Additional items: Standard excess baggage fee | Yes|
| **CloudElite (Business Class)** | 1 special item included             | Additional items: Standard excess baggage fee | Yes|
| **CloudComfort (Premium Economy)** | No free inclusion                   | All items: Standard excess baggage fee         | No |
| **CloudSaver (Economy)**  | No free inclusion                   | All items: Standard excess baggage fee         | No |

> **Note:** Size and weight limits apply. Items above permitted weight/size may attract oversize/overweight charges.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Packing & Handling Guidelines > Sports Equipment > - Should be securely packed and labeled.
- Oversized items (e.g. bicycles, surfboards) require advance notice.
- Fragile items: Passenger advised to insure against damage.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Packing & Handling Guidelines > Musical Instruments > - Small instruments (up to 115 cm/45 in and 7kg): Allowed as cabin baggage (subject to space and safety).
- Larger instruments: Must be checked-in; special packing recommended; advance notification required.
- For extra protection, a paid seat may be booked for larger valuable instruments (subject to availability).

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Packing & Handling Guidelines > Hunting & Sport Rifles, Ammunition > - **Only permitted as checked baggage with:**
  - Valid firearm license(s) and documentation.
  - Prior notification (at least 72 hours before departure).
  - Approval at origin and destination as per local and international regulations.
- **Packing:** Unloaded, dismantled if possible, in rigid locked cases.
- **Ammunition:** Limited to 5 kg per passenger, packed separately from firearms, in manufacturer’s packaging.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Advance Arrangement & Approval > - **Advance notification is mandatory** for all firearms, ammunition, and oversized/fragile items.
- Submit requests via “Manage My Flight” or contact CloudWay 24 Customer Service.
- Confirmation required before travel.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Fees and Charges > - **Refer to the [CloudWay 24 Baggage Calculator](https://cloudway24.com/baggage) for specific rates.**
- Fees vary by route, item size/weight, and membership tier (SkyPoints 24 members may get fee waivers).

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Exclusions and Restrictions > - No carriage of explosive or incendiary items.
- Restrictions applied for travel to/from certain destinations due to local laws.
- Airline reserves the right to refuse any special baggage not meeting safety, security, or compliance requirements.

CloudWay 24 Special Baggage Policy > Contact and Support Information > **For any questions or to pre-arrange your special baggage:**
- Visit [CloudWay24.com](https://cloudway24.com)
- Use the CloudWay 24 App (iOS/Android)
- Or contact our 24x7 Customer Support

_CloudWay 24 – Seamless Skies, Global Reach._
